## 4. Conclusion 

The results of the applied models can be seen in the individual sections, so here we briefly explain what we have experienced and venture an outlook on further work.

Despite mentioning buy and hold once again, we emphasize that it is probably the best strategy in a growing market.

Furthermore, we can report that all the models explained should be taken with caution, since no one can foresee the future, it is necessary to have a certain confidence in your models and take the risk of failure.
